org.mixare

Class MixView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.mixare.MixView

  • public class MixView
extends Activity
    This class is the main application which uses the other classes for different functionalities. It sets up the camera screen and the augmented screen which is in front of the camera screen. It also handles the main sensor events, touch events and location events.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Main application Launcher. Does: - Lock Screen. - Initiate Camera View - Initiate view DataView - Initiate ZoomBar SeekBar widget - Display License Agreement if app first used.
